descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][u][b].:Jobasha's Books:.[/b][/u][/size]

This mod adds a new book store to Winterhold called Jobasha's Books.
The shop can be found just at the end of the path between the ruined houses.

Jobasha's stock is drawn from all the major book level lists. He sells mostly common books but does have a chance to sell rare books. He does not sell Skill books. Spell tomes that he carries are from the novice and adept level lists, same for the scrolls.

Upstairs you can find Charles the plant which will yield one meteor slime (which Jobasha also sells). A reference to his Morrowind counter part ;)
The Meteor Slime cures poison as well as resists it, cures diseases and also fortifies magicka.

Aside from selling books, scrolls and spell tomes Jobasha also sells a small variety of other items:

-Elsweyr Fondue.
-Skooma
-Moonsugar
-Alchemy Recipies
- Burnt and Ruined Books
- Paper rolls, ink wells, quills
- Meteor slime [/center][center]
Jobasha has a full schedule and is open for business 8am-8pm
[/center]
[center].:My other Winterhold mods:.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50148/?]Winterhold Gate[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81457/?]Winterhold Jobasha's Books[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77889/?]Winterhold Bridge Repair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78800/?]Winterhold Temple of Julinaos
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49851/?]Summon Magic Anomaly[/url][/center]

Author note:

It always bothered me how Skyrim had no book stores and Winterhold seemed like the perfect place for this mod. Given that Winterhold is a hub for mages, learners, scholars and knowledge seekers; even with its ruins and failing, something like this should have already have been implemented.

For me the mod was a way to get a little Morrowind Easter egg into the game as well as providing a nice little merchant that sells a unique inventory. Skooma, Moon sugar and the Elsweyr Fondue are meant to link to his Kahjiit background while the misc items, such as inkwells and paper, provide a much needed avenue to items to those who use scroll crafting mods.

I hope you enjoy the mod.


Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53022/?]Jokerine's Misc Resources[/url] - For the Sign outside the shop.
author: midgetalien
